description: Try our easy to follow Herby Mushroom Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Mushroom,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Low fat,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Herby Mushroom Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling salted water following packet instructions or until just tender. Drain and return to saucepan.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Add mushroom and cook, stirring often for 10 minutes or until golden. Add milk, sauce and mustard. Stir until well combined and mixture comes to the boil.
Remove from heat. Add chives and spinach and season with pepper. Toss through pasta. Spoon into bowls and top with parmesan. Serve with a mixed tomato salad.
